definition: to promise/to consent (to do sth)
just/fair/to permit/to allow
to consent/to promise/(literary) yes!

sentences.english: Dorothea seized this as a precious permission .
sentences.chinese: 多蘿西婭認爲這是一個美好的允諾。

sentences.english: Suncor is promising to spend another C$1.2 billion to deal with its tailings.
sentences.chinese: 森科公司允諾再投入12億加元進行尾礦處理。

sentences.english: You try to keep all your commitments in your head and feel overwhelmed.
sentences.chinese: 你努力記住自己作出的所有允諾，感到喘不過氣。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, AI has a lot of promise on the Web.
sentences.chinese: 雖然如此，人工智能在互聯網上有一大堆的允諾。

sentences.english: He promised to continue the fight against infidel forces.
sentences.chinese: 他允諾繼續與無宗教信仰力量的抗爭。

sentences.english: Donnot promise me forever just love me day by day.
sentences.chinese: 不用允諾永遠，只消愛我一天又一天。

sentences.english: The General had promised to cede power by January.
sentences.chinese: 將軍允諾於一月份之前交出兵權。

sentences.english: The role of this part is to educe the focus of this article-administration commitment system.
sentences.chinese: 這一部分的作用是引出本文的重點，即行政允諾制度。

sentences.english: Rain check:(American English) A promise that an unaccepted offer will be renewed in the future.
sentences.chinese: 一種允諾，目前無法接受的提議將來可以重新提出。

sentences.english: He stood to his offer of $100 and would not withdraw.
sentences.chinese: 他遵守提供100英鎊的允諾，決不食言。

sentences.english: FAIRY】The fairy promised to grant the child's wish.
sentences.chinese: 小仙子答應允諾那孩子的希望。

sentences.english: Berman promised to introduce legislation he said would help enhance the profile of intellectual-property protections overseas.
sentences.chinese: 伯曼允諾會提出有助於鞏固海外知識產權保護的法案。

sentences.english: If you promise that you love me .
sentences.chinese: 給我你的愛，承以你親口允諾。

sentences.english: The Internet Economy promised to get rid of the middle-men and we loved it.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網經濟允諾要取締中間人，我們都擁護這一點。

sentences.english: Any subject abide by its commitments and promissory estoppel.
sentences.chinese: 任何主體信守自己的承諾及允諾後不得翻供。

sentences.english: Become wise to their desires and learn to recognize their false promises.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解他們的慾望並學會認清他們其中錯誤的允諾。

definition: to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
to tease/to poke fun at
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to turn a blind eye to
to change/to replace/to alter
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
to adjust one's head and turn one's face (idiom); cosmetic changes/Despite superficially new policies, the substance remains unchanged.
to inquire into/to ask after
to take turns/to work by roster
to keep silent
Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
help to the needy/emergency relief/charity/to give to poorer relative/(also 賙濟|赒济)
to spare no effort
reparations/to pay reparations
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to use up/to exhaust
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
